alert.note: Alert for Daviess; DeKalb; Gentry; Harrison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:48PM CDT until August 11 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Daviess County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Gentry County in northwestern Missouri... Southwestern Harrison County in north central Missouri... Northeastern DeKalb County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 948 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Albany, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Pattonsburg, New Hampton, Coffey, Darlington, Mcfall and Santa Rosa. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 71 and 88. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
